Why did the chicken cross the road?: Q: Why did the forgetful chicken cross the road?
A: To get to the other side -- er[COMMA] no -- to go shopping -- no[COMMA] not that either -- damn it.

Why did the chicken cross the road?: Q: Why did the one-handed man cross the road?
A: To get to the second hand shop.

Why did the chicken cross the road?: Q: Why did the blind blonde cross the road?
A: She was following her seeing-eye chicken.

Why did the chicken cross the road?: Q: Why did the calf cross the road?
A: To get to the udder side.

Why did the chicken cross the road?: Q: Why did the redneck cross the road?
A: He wanted to sleep in the ditch on the other side.

Why did the chicken cross the road?: Q: Why did the monkey cross the road?
A: So he could get spanked.

Why did the chicken cross the road?: Q: Why did the turkey cross the road?
